summary:
This mod contains a new companion that you can find in the tavern in Whiterun (the hunter drunk).
Keirgo is a magician khajiit specializing in all schools of magic.
This fellow is very powerful but not overpower.
It does not require any other mods but I recommend you use the mod that improves the appearance.
descriptionHtml:
* My mother tongue is not English so I rely on a translator for the description .... sorry XD

Hello everyone, this is my first mod so try to be good to me :D

This mod contains a new companion that you can find in the tavern in Whiterun (the hunter drunk).
Keirgo is a magician khajiit specializing in all schools of magic but does not use spells that involve the use of fire ...... they can burn the fur;)

This fellow is very powerful but not overpower.
It does not require any other mods but I recommend you use the mod that improves the appearance.

For the italian people :D

Questa mod contiene un nuovo compagno che potrete trovare a Whiterun nella taverna (il cacciatore ubriaco).
Keirgo è un mago khajiit specializzato in tutte le scuole di magia ma non usa incantesimi che implicano l'uso di fiamme......possono bruciare la pelliccia ;)

Questo compagno è molto potente ma non overpower
Non richiede nessuna altra mod ma vi consiglio di utilizzare delle mod che migliorano l'aspetto.
author: wrpg
